info.name: TypeRacer - Modern v2 (Kathy's Edits)
info.description: This is the user style that Cam created, and I helped with and updated. I'm only publishing this one because I've updated a few things that I can't live without, and several people have asked for them as well.
info.additionalInfo: The original theme can still be found here! I also have an updated version (v3) with font changes and some cool additions from morinted.
